customer_name: GEORGIA DEPT OF NAT RES and WILDLIFE RES
site_name: GEORGIA DEPT OF NAT RES / WILDLIFE RES

citations.narrative:
Multiple large sections of perimeter fence are fully missing. These missing sections are larger that the arm span of the
inspector. An incomplete perimeter fence could allow unauthorized people and animals to access the zoo animals and
cause harm. Also, if an animal escaped its primary enclosure, it could leave the zoo and be injured or pose danger to the
general public. The facility must be enclosed by a perimeter fence that is of sufficient height to keep animals and
unauthorized persons out and to function as a secondary containment system for the animals in the facility.
Correct by April 28, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n
